segments.text: The kitchen feels familiar, like my own home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the scene nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that faucet running unchecked is a problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow water everywhere, puddle widening fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's so into her dish drying, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the danger at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip on that wet floor, and ouch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids raiding the cookie jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's stool is unstable, reaching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plate in hand, he might drop everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's expectant pose is adorable though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden view promises peace after the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR
